dict.acceptation: 陪伴，陪同；附加，补充；与…共存；为…伴奏；

sent.orig: Follow one big band to accompany after one's death with accompany personnel.
sent.trans: 身后跟着一大帮陪同和随从人员。

sent.orig: Prepares to accompany, the printing lyrics, and will accompany induct record the software.
sent.trans: 3准备伴奏，打印歌词，并将伴奏导入录音软件。

sent.orig: This year's National Day holiday, accompany you have!
sent.trans: 今年的国庆假期，陪你一起过！

sent.orig: He chose divers of them, who were asked to accompany him.
sent.trans: 他选择他们当中的几个人，要他们和他作伴。
